title: Tuesday Post Show (8-3-21)
itunes:title: Tuesday Post Show (8-3-21)
description:
Bobby can’t get “Fast Cars and Freedom” out of his head since he performed it at their wedding. Bobby said surprisingly, it’s not his favorite song. Amy was also surprised by a tip line on an online order. Eddie also says that the days of highway heroes are now gone. He says people now refuse his help if he stops and tries to help them on the side of the road. Lunchbox says you also can’t compliment strangers anymore after a girl told him “I have a boyfriend”. Raymundo said he had an interesting moment with Andy Roddick at Bobby’s wedding.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Bobby can’t get “Fast Cars and Freedom” out of his head since he performed it at their wedding. Bobby said surprisingly, it’s not his favorite song. Amy was also surprised by a tip line on an online order. Eddie also says that the days of highway heroes are now gone. He says people now refuse his help if he stops and tries to help them on the side of the road. Lunchbox says you also can’t compliment strangers anymore after a girl told him “I have a boyfriend”. Raymundo said he had an interesting moment with Andy Roddick at Bobby’s wedding.
